ai-mil3.1.7:1.2_0: “Areny of Nāgadatta didn’t properly attend to the dragon?”
ai-mil3.1.7:1.3_0: “Great king, paying attention and improper attention to skillful qualities.”
ai-mil3.1.7:1.5_0: “No, great king, other focuses on other foundations, wisdom; other persons don’t pay attention.”
ai-mil3.1.7:3.1_0: Proper attention is the seventh liberation.
